name: Lab BreakOut
description:
Lab BreakOut is a hardcore precision gravity-shifting platformer with minimal graphics.
The creature, the victim of the experiment, has to escape from the laboratory in which it was created. Saws, thorns, lasers - everything around and strives to kill the main character. You should be careful and careful, because there are no checkpoints at the levels. Take control of the creature and set it free!
